actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to direct the Director of the National Bureau of Standards to issue regulations with respect to recycled oil.

summary.text: Defines the term "recycled oil" and authorizes the Director of the National Bureau of Standards to issue regulations with respect to recycled oil. Provides that no excise tax shall be imposed on recycled oil which is not for use in automobiles.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Director of the National Bureau of Standards to issue regulations with respect to recycled oil.
